body_html:
Hi,

I believe I can make your example of ReduceWindow followed by Divide work within the existing framework of fusion.

You could represent it as a kOutput fusion node where the kDivide follows the kReduceWindow.

body:
Hi,

I believe I can make your example of ReduceWindow followed by Divide work within the existing framework of fusion.

You could represent it as a kOutput fusion node where the kDivide follows the kReduceWindow.
